title: CVE-2019-25013 (baseboard_management_controller_500f_firmware, baseboard_management_controller_a250_firmware, debian_linux, fabric_operating_system, fedora, glibc, ontap_select_deploy_administration_utility, service_processor)
description: The iconv feature in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) through 2.32, when processing invalid multi-byte input sequences in the EUC-KR encoding, may have a buffer over-read.
